posts.post_content:

Scott, good luck with the last few cards.

Patrick

OOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOHHHHHHHHHHHH...... Pat ............. believe me I KNOW !!!!!! ;)

Now that that cat's out of the bag, second toughest will be Becker, imo.  But, then again, I thought Hunter wasn't going to happen, but it did (Cycle).

Other's are just going to be patience, luck, and $$$$$ :o

BTW, won Sov. Burch/bat last night on ebay, at a acceptable price :):):)

All part of the fun, fun, Scott :rolleyes:

It's all about the fun. I'm currently 13 away from a 520 non Piedmont/Sweet Caporal set. Otherwise 6 away from 520. 1351/???? on the master set. I'm in need of 5 of the cards you listed. Those last few are tuff ones. Good luck and happy collecting as always, Ron

Sorry Scott I didn't mean to let the cat out of the bag.

Tim Cathey had some impressive Boston back runs including this Becker run,
I'm not sure if he sold them all or not.
[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=280038&d=1499724931[/IMG]

August Bump ;)

So, need 8 commons:

Wid Conroy (Fielding)
Monte Cross
Jerry Downs
Bill O'Hara (New York)
Harry Pattee

October Bump ......
